purpleculture_pinyin:
cāng
blue-green or azure (of water); vast (of water); cold
сине-зеленый или лазурный (воды); обширный (воды); холодный
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 沧)
Pictophonetic: 倉 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
滄桑 [ cāng sāng ]: great changes; ups and downs; vicissitudes; abbr. of 沧海桑田
滄海桑田 [ cāng hǎi sāng tián ]: lit. the blue sea turned into mulberry fields (idiom); fig. the transformations of the world
滄海一粟 [ cāng hǎi yī sù ]: a drop in the ocean (idiom)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 倉 [ cāng ] granary, barn; cabin, berth
heisig_chinese_memo: The storehouse puts preservatives in its water which turn it a dark blue color.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The storehouse puts preservatives in its water which turn it a dark blue color.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " to " cang ". The original meaning is cold. "Said Wen": "Cang, Han Ye. From the water, the sound of the warehouse." Such as "Selected Works. "Uncle Mei" Admonishment to the King of Wu": "If you want the soup, one person cooks it, and a hundred people raise it. It is useless. It is better to stop the fire with absolute salary." "Liezi. "Tang Qiao": "At the beginning of the day, the Cang Cang Cang is cool and cool, and it is like exploring the soup. Isn't this hot for those who are near and cool for those who are far?" " Cang " is opposite to " hot " in ancient books, such as "Yi Zhou Shu. "Zhou Zhu": "There is great heat between heaven and earth, and those who make good use of Dao will never exhaust ." " Cang " is the same as "凔", so Duan Yucai's note: "All the words have the same sound and meaning." See "凔".

" Cang " through " dark green ", expressing deep blue. Such as "Mencius. "Li Lou Shang": "The water of the Canglang is clear, you can squeeze me." Jiao Xunzheng: "Cang, Cang, Cang, the three characters are common." "Selected Works. Lu Shiheng's "Tang Xing": "Under the algae jade platform, the shadow of Canglangquan." Li Shan's note: "Canglang, the color of the water." Because " Cang " mostly describes the shape and color of deep water, "Canghai" has deep sea, The meaning of the sea. Such as "New Tang Book. "Biography of Di Renjie": "Zhongni said that he has seen knowledge and benevolence, and you can be described as a legacy from the sea." Northern Song Dynasty Su Shi's "Pre-Chibi Fu": "Send a mayfly in the world, a millet in the sea."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and " cang ". The original meaning is cold, which is the same as "凔".
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「倉」聲。本義是寒冷。《說文》：「滄，寒也。从水，倉聲。」如《文選．枚叔〈上書諫吳王〉》：「欲湯之滄，一人炊之，百人揚之，無益也，不如絕薪止火而已。」《列子．湯問》：「日初出滄滄涼涼，及其中如探湯，此不為近者熱而遠者涼乎？」「滄」在古書中與「熱」相對，如《逸周書．周祝》：「天地之間有滄熱，善用道者終不竭。」「滄」同「凔」，故段玉裁注：「仌部凔字音義同。」參見「凔」。

　　「滄」通「蒼」，表示深藍色。如《孟子．離婁上》：「滄浪之水清兮，可以濯我纓。」焦循正義：「蒼、倉、滄，三字並通用。」《文選．陸士衡〈塘上行〉》：「發藻玉臺下，垂影滄浪泉。」李善注：「滄浪，水色也。」因「蒼」多形容深水的形色，「蒼海」又有深海、大海的意思。如《新唐書．狄仁傑傳》：「仲尼稱觀過知仁，君可謂滄海遺珠矣。」北宋蘇軾〈前赤壁賦〉：「寄蜉蝣於天地，渺滄海之一粟。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「倉」聲。本義是寒冷，同「凔」。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
滄 (Simplified: 沧)
Pinyin: cāng
English Definition: blue-green or azure (of water); vast (of water); cold
Total strokes: 13; Radical: 水
Pictophonetic: 倉 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 倉 [ cāng ] granary, barn; cabin, berth
Example Words:
滄桑 [ cāng sāng ]: great changes; ups and downs; vicissitudes; abbr. of 沧海桑田
滄海桑田 [ cāng hǎi sāng tián ]: lit. the blue sea turned into mulberry fields (idiom); fig. the transformations of the world
滄海一粟 [ cāng hǎi yī sù ]: a drop in the ocean (idiom)
More: 滄* | *滄 | *滄*

Original meaning 本义: Meaning blue.

Compound 滄沧 from three-dot-water 氵 shuǐ and phonetic building-granary (仓)倉 cāng.

從「 水 」，「 倉 」聲。本義是寒冷。《說文》：「滄，寒也。从水，倉聲。」如《文選．枚叔〈上書諫吳王〉》：「欲湯之滄，一人炊之，百人揚之，無益也，不如絕薪止火而已。」《列子．湯問》：「日初出滄滄涼涼，及其中如探湯，此不為近者熱而遠者涼乎？」「 滄 」在古書中與「 熱 」相對，如《逸周書．周祝》：「天地之間有滄熱，善用道者終不竭。」「 滄 」同「 凔 」，故段玉裁注：「仌部凔字音義同。」參見「 凔 」。 「 滄 」通「 蒼 」，表示深藍色。如《孟子．離婁上》：「滄浪之水清兮，可以濯我纓。」焦循正義：「蒼、倉、滄，三字並通用。」《文選．陸士衡〈塘上行〉》：「發藻玉臺下，垂影滄浪泉。」李善注：「滄浪，水色也。」因「 蒼 」多形容深水的形色，「蒼海」又有深海、大海的意思。如《新唐書．狄仁傑傳》：「仲尼稱觀過知仁，君可謂滄海遺珠矣。」北宋蘇軾〈前赤壁賦〉：「寄蜉蝣於天地，渺滄海之一粟。」
